df-poset
blocks.content: Define the class of partially ordered sets (posets). A poset is a set equipped with a partial order, that is, a binary relation which is reflexive, antisymmetric, and transitive. Unlike a total order, in a partial order there may be pairs of elements where neither precedes the other. Definition of poset in [Crawley] p. 1. Note that Crawley-Dilworth require that a poset base set be nonempty, but we follow the convention of most authors who don't make this a requirement. In our formalism of extensible structures, the base set of a poset ` f ` is denoted by ` ( Base `` f ) ` and its partial order by ` ( le `` f ) ` (for "less than or equal to"). The quantifiers ` E. b E. r ` provide a notational shorthand to allow us to refer to the base and ordering relation as ` b ` and ` r ` in the definition rather than having to repeat ` ( Base `` f ) ` and ` ( le `` f ) ` throughout. These quantifiers can be eliminated with ~ ceqsex2v and related theorems. (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2012.)

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
}

axiom df-poset(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ‚ä¢ Poset = { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s2,(s1 =(Base ` s0)‚àß s2 =(le ` s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s1, ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà s1, ‚àÄ(s5 ‚àà s1,(s3[s2]s3 ‚àß((s3[s2]s4 ‚àß s4[s2]s3)‚Üí s3 = s4)‚àß((s3[s2]s4 ‚àß s4[s2]s5)‚Üí s3[s2]s5))))))))}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)

  ‚ä£ d(s2, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)
}

blocks.name: ispos2
blocks.content: A poset is an antisymmetric proset. _EDITORIAL_: could become the definition of poset. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)

}

thm posi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), w3a(wbr(c1, c5, c1), wi(wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wceq(c1, c3)), wi(wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c4)), wbr(c1, c5, c4))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cple, c0))

blocks.name: posref
blocks.content: A poset ordering is reflexive. (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2011.) (Proof shortened by OpenAI, 25-Mar-2020.)

blocks.name: posasymb

blocks.name: postr
blocks.content: A poset ordering is transitive. (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2011.)

blocks.name: 0pos
blocks.content: Technical lemma to simplify the statement of ~ ipopos . The empty set is (rather pathologically) a poset under our definitions, since it has an empty base set ( ~ str0 ) and any relation partially orders an empty set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm 0pos() {
  |- wcel(emptycls, cpo)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wcel(emptycls, cpo), wcel(emptycls, universe), wral(hs0, emptycls, wral(hs1, emptycls, wral(hs2, emptycls, w3a(wbr(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(hs0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), emptycls, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), emptycls, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(hs2))))))))
  0ex()
  ral0(hs0, wral(hs1, emptycls, wral(hs2, emptycls, w3a(wbr(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(hs0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), emptycls, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), emptycls, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(hs2)))))))
  ispos(hs0, hs1, hs2, emptycls, emptycls, emptycls)
  base0()
  str0(cple, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  df-ple()
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs1.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs2.c(emptycls)
}

thm 0pos() {
  ‚ä¢ ‚àÖ ‚àà Poset
} = {
  mpbir2an(‚àÖ ‚àà Poset, ‚àÖ ‚àà ùïå, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ‚àÖ, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ‚àÖ, ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà ‚àÖ,(hs0[‚àÖ]hs0 ‚àß((hs0[‚àÖ]hs1 ‚àß hs1[‚àÖ]hs0)‚Üí hs0 = hs1)‚àß((hs0[‚àÖ]hs1 ‚àß hs1[‚àÖ]hs2)‚Üí hs0[‚àÖ]hs2))))))
  0ex()
  ral0(hs0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ‚àÖ, ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà ‚àÖ,(hs0[‚àÖ]hs0 ‚àß((hs0[‚àÖ]hs1 ‚àß hs1[‚àÖ]hs0)‚Üí hs0 = hs1)‚àß((hs0[‚àÖ]hs1 ‚àß hs1[‚àÖ]hs2)‚Üí hs0[‚àÖ]hs2)))))
  ispos(hs0, hs1, hs2, emptycls, emptycls, emptycls)
  base0()
  str0(cple, cdc(1, 0))
  df-ple()
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)

  diff.hs2.c(emptycls)

blocks.name: isposd
blocks.content: Properties that determine a poset (implicit structure version). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2014.)

  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  3jca(wa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))

  anbi2d(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, w3a(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))))), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(s2, cfv(cbs, c0), w3a(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s2))))))))
  raleqbidv(s0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), w0, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, w3a(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(s2, cfv(cbs, c0), w3a(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s2)))))))
  raleqbidv(s1, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), w0, wral(s2, c1, w3a(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))), wral(s2, cfv(cbs, c0), w3a(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s2))))))
  raleqbidv(s2, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), w0, w3a(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))), w3a(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s2)))))
  3anbi123d(w0, wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s2))))
  breqd(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), w0)
  imbi1d(w0, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s0))))
  anbi12d(w0, wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(s0)))

blocks.pretty:
thm isposd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Poset)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 =(Base ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(le ` c0))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí s0[c2]s0)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c1))‚Üí((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Poset), d(s0, c1))
  sylibr(w0, c0 ‚àà Poset, (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(s0[(le ` c0)]s0 ‚àß((s0[(le ` c0)]s1 ‚àß s1[(le ` c0)]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1)‚àß((s0[(le ` c0)]s1 ‚àß s1[(le ` c0)]s2)‚Üí s0[(le ` c0)]s2)))))))
  mpbi2and(w0, (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(s0[(le ` c0)]s0 ‚àß((s0[(le ` c0)]s1 ‚àß s1[(le ` c0)]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1)‚àß((s0[(le ` c0)]s1 ‚àß s1[(le ` c0)]s2)‚Üí s0[(le ` c0)]s2)))))), c0 ‚àà ùïå, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s0[c2]s0 ‚àß((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1)‚àß((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2))))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c1, c1, w0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s0[c2]s0 ‚àß((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1)‚àß((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2))))
  ralrimiva(s2, c1, (w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)), (s0[c2]s0 ‚àß((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1)‚àß((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2)))
  3jca(((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1))‚àß s2 ‚àà c1), s0[c2]s0, ((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1), ((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2))
  adantr((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)), s2 ‚àà c1, s0[c2]s0)
  adantrr(w0, s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1, s0[c2]s0)
  adantr((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)), s2 ‚àà c1, ((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1))
  3expb(w0, s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1, ((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1))
  imp42(w0, s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1, s2 ‚àà c1, ((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2))
  3exp2(w0, s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1, s2 ‚àà c1, ((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2))
  anbi2d(w0, c0 ‚àà ùïå, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s0[c2]s0 ‚àß((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1)‚àß((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2))))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(s0[(le ` c0)]s0 ‚àß((s0[(le ` c0)]s1 ‚àß s1[(le ` c0)]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1)‚àß((s0[(le ` c0)]s1 ‚àß s1[(le ` c0)]s2)‚Üí s0[(le ` c0)]s2))))))
  raleqbidv(s0, c1, (Base ` c0), w0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s0[c2]s0 ‚àß((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1)‚àß((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2)))), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(s0[(le ` c0)]s0 ‚àß((s0[(le ` c0)]s1 ‚àß s1[(le ` c0)]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1)‚àß((s0[(le ` c0)]s1 ‚àß s1[(le ` c0)]s2)‚Üí s0[(le ` c0)]s2)))))
  raleqbidv(s1, c1, (Base ` c0), w0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s0[c2]s0 ‚àß((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1)‚àß((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2))), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(s0[(le ` c0)]s0 ‚àß((s0[(le ` c0)]s1 ‚àß s1[(le ` c0)]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1)‚àß((s0[(le ` c0)]s1 ‚àß s1[(le ` c0)]s2)‚Üí s0[(le ` c0)]s2))))
  raleqbidv(s2, c1, (Base ` c0), w0, (s0[c2]s0 ‚àß((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1)‚àß((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2)), (s0[(le ` c0)]s0 ‚àß((s0[(le ` c0)]s1 ‚àß s1[(le ` c0)]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1)‚àß((s0[(le ` c0)]s1 ‚àß s1[(le ` c0)]s2)‚Üí s0[(le ` c0)]s2)))
  3anbi123d(w0, s0[c2]s0, ((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1), ((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2), s0[(le ` c0)]s0, ((s0[(le ` c0)]s1 ‚àß s1[(le ` c0)]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1), ((s0[(le ` c0)]s1 ‚àß s1[(le ` c0)]s2)‚Üí s0[(le ` c0)]s2))
  breqd(s0, c2, s0, (le ` c0), w0)

  anbi12d(w0, s0[c2]s1, s1[c2]s2, s0[(le ` c0)]s1, s1[(le ` c0)]s2)
  breqd(s0, c2, s1, (le ` c0), w0)

blocks.name: isposi
blocks.content: Properties that determine a poset (implicit structure version). (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm isposi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wcel(c0, cpo)
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c0, universe), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, w3a(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))))))
  rgen3(s0, s1, s2, c1, c1, c1, w3a(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))
  3jca(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)))
  3adant3(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  ispos(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isposi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 ‚àà Poset
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(le ` c0)
  ‚ä£ (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí s0[c2]s0)
  ‚ä£ ((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1))
  ‚ä£ ((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  mpbir2an(c0 ‚àà Poset, c0 ‚àà ùïå, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s0[c2]s0 ‚àß((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1)‚àß((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2))))))
  rgen3(s0, s1, s2, c1, c1, c1, (s0[c2]s0 ‚àß((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1)‚àß((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2)))
  3jca((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c1), s0[c2]s0, ((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1), ((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2))
  3ad2ant1(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1, s2 ‚àà c1, s0[c2]s0)
  3adant3(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1, s2 ‚àà c1, ((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1))
  ispos(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: isposix
blocks.content: Properties that determine a poset (explicit structure version). Note that the numeric indices of the structure components are not mentioned explicitly in either the theorem or its proof. (Contributed by NM, 9-Nov-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm isposix(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wcel(c0, cpo)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c2)))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  isposi(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2)
  eqeltri(c0, universe, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c2)))
  prex(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c2))
  ax-mp(wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c1, universe))
  2strbas(c1, universe, c0, cple, c2, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  ax-mp(wceq(c2, cfv(cple, c0)), wcel(c2, universe))
  2strop(c2, universe, cple, c0, c1, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  df-ple()
  1lt10()
  10nn()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isposix(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 ‚àà Poset
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ c2 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ c0 = { <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(le ` ndx), c2 > }
  ‚ä£ (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí s0[c2]s0)
  ‚ä£ ((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s0 = s1))
  ‚ä£ ((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((s0[c2]s1 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  isposi(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2)
  eqeltri(c0, universe, { <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(le ` ndx), c2 > })
  prex(<(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(le ` ndx), c2 >)
  ax-mp(c1 =(Base ` c0), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  2strbas(c1, universe, c0, cple, c2, cdc(1, 0))
  ax-mp(c2 =(le ` c0), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  2strop(c2, universe, cple, c0, c1, cdc(1, 0))
  df-ple()
  1lt10()
  10nn()
}

blocks.name: df-plt
blocks.content: Define less-than ordering for posets and related structures. Unlike ~ df-base and ~ df-ple , this is a derived component extractor and not an extensible structure component extractor that defines the poset. (Contributed by NM, 12-Oct-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: pltfval
blocks.content: Value of the less-than relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pltfval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cdif(c3, cid)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplt, c0))
} = {
  syl5eq(c2, cdif(c3, cid), cfv(cplt, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cplt, c0), cdif(c3, cid)), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cplt, cdif(c3, cid), cdif(cfv(cple, cv(hs0)), cid))
  difeq1d(cfv(cple, cv(hs0)), cid, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cple, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cple, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cple)
  df-plt(hs0)
  difexi(c3, cid)
  fvexi(c3, cple, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c3, cid))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pltfval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(c3 \ =))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(le ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(lt ` c0)
} = {
  syl5eq(c2, (c3 \ =), (lt ` c0), c0 ‚àà c1)
  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, (lt ` c0)=(c3 \ =), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cplt, (c3 \ =), ((le ` hs0)\ =))
  difeq1d((le ` hs0), cid, c3, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((le ` hs0), c3, (le ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cple)
  df-plt(hs0)
  difexi(c3, cid)
  fvexi(c3, cple, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((c3 \ =))
}

blocks.name: pltval
blocks.content: Less-than relation. ( ~ df-pss analog.) (Contributed by NM, 12-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm pltval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wb(wbr(c2, c6, c4), wa(wbr(c2, c7, c4), wne(c2, c4))))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cplt, c0))
} = {
  3impb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wb(wbr(c2, c6, c4), wa(wbr(c2, c7, c4), wne(c2, c4))))
  sylan9bb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wbr(c2, c6, c4), wa(wbr(c2, c7, c4), wne(c2, c4)), wbr(c2, cdif(c7, cid), c4))
  breqd(c2, c6, c4, cdif(c7, cid), wcel(c0, c1))
  pltfval(c0, c1, c6, c7)
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wbr(c2, cdif(c7, cid), c4), wa(wbr(c2, c7, c4), wne(c2, c4)), wa(wbr(c2, c7, c4), wn(wbr(c2, cid, c4))))
  brdif(c2, c7, cid, c4)
  anbi2d(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wbr(c2, c7, c4), wn(wbr(c2, cid, c4)), wne(c2, c4))
  adantl(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wb(wn(wbr(c2, cid, c4)), wne(c2, c4)))
  necon3bbid(c2, c4, wcel(c4, c5), wbr(c2, cid, c4))
  ideqg(c4, c5, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pltval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5)‚Üí(c2[c6]c4 ‚Üî(c2[c7]c4 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c4)))
  ‚ä£ c7 =(le ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(lt ` c0)
} = {
  3impb(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c5, (c2[c6]c4 ‚Üî(c2[c7]c4 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c4)))
  sylan9bb(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5), c2[c6]c4, (c2[c7]c4 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c4), c2[(c7 \ =)]c4)
  breqd(c2, c6, c4, (c7 \ =), c0 ‚àà c1)
  pltfval(c0, c1, c6, c7)
  syl5bb((c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5), c2[(c7 \ =)]c4, (c2[c7]c4 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c4), (c2[c7]c4 ‚àß ¬¨ c2[=]c4))
  brdif(c2, c7, cid, c4)
  anbi2d((c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5), c2[c7]c4, ¬¨ c2[=]c4, c2 ‚â† c4)
  adantl(c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c5, (¬¨ c2[=]c4 ‚Üî c2 ‚â† c4))
  necon3bbid(c2, c4, c4 ‚àà c5, c2[=]c4)

blocks.name: pltle
blocks.content: "Less than" implies "less than or equal to". ( ~ pssss analog.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2011.)

blocks.name: pltne
blocks.content: The "less than" relation is not reflexive. ( ~ df-pss analog.) (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2011.)

blocks.name: pltirr
blocks.content: The "less than" relation is not reflexive. ( ~ pssirr analog.) (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2012.)

blocks.name: pleval2i
blocks.content: One direction of ~ pleval2 . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pleval2i(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wi(wbr(c0, c3, c2), wo(wbr(c0, c4, c2), wceq(c0, c2))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cple, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplt, c5))
} = {
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, c3, c2), wo(wbr(c0, c4, c2), wceq(c0, c2)))
  orrd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, c3, c2)), wbr(c0, c4, c2), wceq(c0, c2))
  necon1bd(c0, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, c3, c2)), wbr(c0, c4, c2))
  expr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, c3, c2), wne(c0, c2), wbr(c0, c4, c2))
  biimpar(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wbr(c0, c3, c2), wne(c0, c2)), wbr(c0, c4, c2))
  mpancom(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wbr(c0, c4, c2), wa(wbr(c0, c3, c2), wne(c0, c2))), wcel(c5, cdm(cbs)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c5, cdm(cbs)))
  eleq2s(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c5), wcel(c5, cdm(cbs)))
  elfvdm(c0, cbs, c5)
  3expb(wcel(c5, cdm(cbs)), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wb(wbr(c0, c4, c2), wa(wbr(c0, c3, c2), wne(c0, c2))))
  pltval(c5, cdm(cbs), c0, c1, c2, c1, c4, c3)
}

thm pleval2i(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(c0[c3]c2 ‚Üí(c0[c4]c2 ‚à® c0 = c2)))

  ‚ä£ c3 =(le ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(lt ` c5)
} = {
  ex((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), c0[c3]c2, (c0[c4]c2 ‚à® c0 = c2))
  orrd(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚àß c0[c3]c2), c0[c4]c2, c0 = c2)
  necon1bd(c0, c2, ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚àß c0[c3]c2), c0[c4]c2)
  expr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), c0[c3]c2, c0 ‚â† c2, c0[c4]c2)
  biimpar((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), (c0[c3]c2 ‚àß c0 ‚â† c2), c0[c4]c2)
  mpancom((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), (c0[c4]c2 ‚Üî(c0[c3]c2 ‚àß c0 ‚â† c2)), c5 ‚àà dom(Base))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c1, c5 ‚àà dom(Base))
  eleq2s(c0, c1, (Base ` c5), c5 ‚àà dom(Base))
  elfvdm(c0, cbs, c5)
  3expb(c5 ‚àà dom(Base), c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c1, (c0[c4]c2 ‚Üî(c0[c3]c2 ‚àß c0 ‚â† c2)))
  pltval(c5, dom(Base), c0, c1, c2, c1, c4, c3)
}

blocks.name: pleval2
blocks.content: "Less than or equal to" in terms of "less than". ( ~ sspss analog.) (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pleval2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplt, c0))
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c4, c3), wo(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wceq(c1, c3)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wi(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wo(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wceq(c1, c3))))
  pleval2i(c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c0)
  jaod(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c5, c3), wceq(c1, c3), wbr(c1, c4, c3))
  pltle(c0, cpo, c1, c2, c3, c2, c5, c4)
  syl5ibcom(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c1, c3), wbr(c1, c4, c3), wbr(c1, c4, c1))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wbr(c1, c4, c1))
  posref(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  breq2(c1, c3, c1, c4)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Poset ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c1[c4]c3 ‚Üî(c1[c5]c3 ‚à® c1 = c3)))

blocks.name: pltnle
blocks.content: "Less than" implies not converse "less than or equal to". (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm pltnle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c4, c3)), wn(wbr(c3, c5, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplt, c0))
} = {
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c4, c3), wn(wbr(c3, c5, c1)))
  sylbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c4, c3), wn(wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wne(c1, c3)))
  pltval(c0, cpo, c1, c2, c3, c2, c4, c5)
  expimpd(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c5, c3), wne(c1, c3), wn(wbr(c3, c5, c1)))
  necon3ad(c1, c3, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c5, c3)), wbr(c3, c5, c1))
  expdimp(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1), wceq(c1, c3))
  biimpd(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wceq(c1, c3))
  posasymb(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pltnle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (((c0 ‚àà Poset ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß c1[c4]c3)‚Üí ¬¨ c3[c5]c1)

} = {

  sylbid((c0 ‚àà Poset ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), c1[c4]c3, ¬¨ c3[c5]c1, (c1[c5]c3 ‚àß c1 ‚â† c3))
  pltval(c0, cpo, c1, c2, c3, c2, c4, c5)
  expimpd((c0 ‚àà Poset ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), c1[c5]c3, c1 ‚â† c3, ¬¨ c3[c5]c1)
  necon3ad(c1, c3, ((c0 ‚àà Poset ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß c1[c5]c3), c3[c5]c1)
  expdimp((c0 ‚àà Poset ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), c1[c5]c3, c3[c5]c1, c1 = c3)
  biimpd((c0 ‚àà Poset ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (c1[c5]c3 ‚àß c3[c5]c1), c1 = c3)
  posasymb(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
}

  impbid(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c5, c3)), wceq(c1, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c5, c3), wi(wceq(c1, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1)))
  syl5ibcom(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c1, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1), wbr(c1, c5, c1))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wbr(c1, c5, c1))

  breq1(c1, c3, c5, c1)

  biimpd(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wceq(c1, c3))

  syl5ibcom((c0 ‚àà Poset ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), c1 = c3, c3[c5]c1, c1[c5]c1)

blocks.name: pltnlt
blocks.content: The less-than relation implies the negation of its inverse. (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2011.)

blocks.name: pltn2lp
blocks.content: The less-than relation has no 2-cycle loops. ( ~ pssn2lp analog.) (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm pltn2lp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wn(wa(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wbr(c3, c4, c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplt, c0))
} = {
  sylib(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wn(wa(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wbr(c3, c4, c1))), wi(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wn(wbr(c3, c4, c1))))
  nsyld(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c4, c3), wbr(c3, c4, c1), wbr(c3, cfv(cple, c0), c1))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c4, c3), wn(wbr(c3, cfv(cple, c0), c1)))
  pltnle(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(cple, c0))
  3com23(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wi(wbr(c3, c4, c1), wbr(c3, cfv(cple, c0), c1)))
  pltle(c0, cpo, c3, c2, c1, c2, c4, cfv(cple, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c0))
  imnan(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wbr(c3, c4, c1))
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Poset ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí ¬¨(c1[c4]c3 ‚àß c3[c4]c1))

  ex((c0 ‚àà Poset ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), c1[c4]c3, ¬¨ c3[(le ` c0)]c1)
  pltnle(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, (le ` c0))
  3com23(c0 ‚àà Poset, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c3[c4]c1 ‚Üí c3[(le ` c0)]c1))
  pltle(c0, cpo, c3, c2, c1, c2, c4, (le ` c0))
  eqid((le ` c0))
  imnan(c1[c4]c3, c3[c4]c1)

blocks.name: plttr
blocks.content: The less-than relation is transitive. ( ~ psstr analog.) (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm plttr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wi(wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c4)), wbr(c1, c5, c4)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplt, c0))
} = {
  sylibrd(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c4)), wbr(c1, c5, c4), wa(wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c4), wne(c1, c4)))
  jcad(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c4)), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c4), wne(c1, c4))
  syl2and(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c4), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c4), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c3), wbr(c3, cfv(cple, c0), c4))
  3adant3r3(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wi(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c3)))
  pltle(c0, cpo, c1, c2, c3, c2, c5, cfv(cple, c0))
  3adant3r1(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wi(wbr(c3, c5, c4), wbr(c3, cfv(cple, c0), c4)))
  pltle(c0, cpo, c3, c2, c4, c2, c5, cfv(cple, c0))
  postr(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(cple, c0))
  necon2ad(c1, c4, wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c4)))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(c1, c4), wn(wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c4))), wn(wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1))))
  3adant3r3(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wn(wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1))))
  pltn2lp(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
  notbid(wceq(c1, c4), wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c4)))

thm pltletr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {

  3adant3r1(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wb(wbr(c3, c6, c4), wo(wbr(c3, c5, c4), wceq(c3, c4))))
  pleval2(c0, c3, c2, c4, c6, c5)
  jaod(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(c1, c5, c3)), wbr(c3, c5, c4), wceq(c3, c4), wbr(c1, c5, c4))

  plttr(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(c1, c5, c3), wi(wceq(c3, c4), wbr(c1, c5, c4)))

  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wpo(c2, c3), wss(cres(cid, c3), c4))), wceq(c4, cfv(cple, c0)))

blocks.content: Domain of the least upper bound function of a poset. (Contributed by NM, 6-Sep-2018.)

thm lubdm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), crab(s0, cpw(c1), wreu(s1, c1, w1))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cple, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(club, c2))
  -| wb(w1, wa(wral(s2, cv(s0), wbr(cv(s2), c3, cv(s1))), wral(s3, c1, wi(wral(s2, cv(s0), wbr(cv(s2), c3, cv(s3))), wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s3))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
} = {

} = {

  biid(wa(wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c1, wi(wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2))))))

  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)

  diff.hs1.c(c1)

blocks.content: Properties of greatest lower bound of a poset. (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2011.) (Revised by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)

thm lubprop(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cfv(c2, c0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cple, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(club, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cfv(c2, c0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(s1)))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  mpbird(w0, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cfv(c2, c0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(s1))))), wceq(crio(hs0, c3, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)))))), cfv(c2, c0)))
  eqcomd(crio(hs0, c3, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)))))), cfv(c2, c0), w0)
  lubval(hs0, s0, s1, c2, c0, c3, c4, c1, c5, w0, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1))))))
  lubelss(c0, c3, c4, c1, c2, c5, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cfv(c2, c0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(s1))))), wceq(crio(hs0, c3, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)))))), cfv(c2, c0))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), c3), wreu(hs0, c3, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)))))))
  lubcl(c2, c0, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  lubeu(hs0, s0, s1, c3, c4, c1, c2, c0, c5, w0, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1))))))
  biid(wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1))))))
  riota2(hs0, cfv(c2, c0), c3, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1))))), wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cfv(c2, c0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(s1))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cfv(c2, c0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(s1)))))
  ralbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cfv(c2, c0)))
  breq2(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0), cv(s0), c1)
  ralbidv(s1, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1))), wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(s1))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(s1)))
  breq1(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c2, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cfv(c2, c0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(s1))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2, c0)
}

thm lubprop(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1](c2 ` c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]s1)‚Üí(c2 ` c0)[c1]s1))))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(le ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(lub ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà dom(c2))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1](c2 ` c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]s1)‚Üí(c2 ` c0)[c1]s1)))), d(s0, c1))
  mpbird(w0, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1](c2 ` c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]s1)‚Üí(c2 ` c0)[c1]s1))), iota(hs0 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]s1)‚Üí hs0[c1]s1))))=(c2 ` c0))
  eqcomd(iota(hs0 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]s1)‚Üí hs0[c1]s1)))), (c2 ` c0), w0)
  lubval(hs0, s0, s1, c2, c0, c3, c4, c1, c5, w0, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]s1)‚Üí hs0[c1]s1))))
  lubelss(c0, c3, c4, c1, c2, c5, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1](c2 ` c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]s1)‚Üí(c2 ` c0)[c1]s1)))‚Üî iota(hs0 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]s1)‚Üí hs0[c1]s1))))=(c2 ` c0)), (c2 ` c0)‚àà c3, ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]s1)‚Üí hs0[c1]s1)))))
  lubcl(c2, c0, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  lubeu(hs0, s0, s1, c3, c4, c1, c2, c0, c5, w0, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]s1)‚Üí hs0[c1]s1))))
  biid((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]s1)‚Üí hs0[c1]s1))))
  riota2(hs0, (c2 ` c0), c3, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]s1)‚Üí hs0[c1]s1))), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1](c2 ` c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]s1)‚Üí(c2 ` c0)[c1]s1))))
  anbi12d(hs0 =(c2 ` c0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]hs0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]s1)‚Üí hs0[c1]s1)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1](c2 ` c0)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]s1)‚Üí(c2 ` c0)[c1]s1)))
  ralbidv(s0, c0, hs0 =(c2 ` c0), s0[c1]hs0, s0[c1](c2 ` c0))
  breq2(hs0, (c2 ` c0), s0, c1)
  ralbidv(s1, c3, hs0 =(c2 ` c0), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]s1)‚Üí hs0[c1]s1), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]s1)‚Üí(c2 ` c0)[c1]s1))
  imbi2d(hs0 =(c2 ` c0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]s1), hs0[c1]s1, (c2 ` c0)[c1]s1)
  breq1(hs0, (c2 ` c0), c1, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c((c2 ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1](c2 ` c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]s1)‚Üí(c2 ` c0)[c1]s1))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, (c2 ` c0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, (c2 ` c0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2, c0)

blocks.name: luble
blocks.content: The greatest lower bound is the least element. (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2011.) (Revised by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)

thm luble(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cple, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(club, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cdm(c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
} = {
  rspcdva(hs0, c0, c3, w0, wbr(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cfv(c2, c3)))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3))
  simpld(w0, wral(hs0, c3, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cfv(c2, c3))), wral(hs1, c4, wi(wral(hs0, c3, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c3), c1, cv(hs1)))))
  lubprop(hs0, hs1, c3, c1, c2, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
}

thm luble(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0[c1](c2 ` c3))

thm lublecllem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {

  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(wa(wral(s1, crab(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))), wral(s3, c0, wi(wral(s1, crab(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s3))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s3))))), wceq(cv(s0), c2))), wceq(c4, cfv(club, c3)))
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(wa(wral(s1, crab(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))), wral(s3, c0, wi(wral(s1, crab(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s3))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s3))))), wceq(cv(s0), c2))), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(wa(wral(s1, crab(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))), wral(s3, c0, wi(wral(s1, crab(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s3))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s3))))), wceq(cv(s0), c2))), diffss(s2, s3))
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(wa(wral(s1, crab(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))), wral(s3, c0, wi(wral(s1, crab(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s3))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s3))))), wceq(cv(s0), c2))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(wa(wral(s1, crab(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))), wral(s3, c0, wi(wral(s1, crab(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s3))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s3))))), wceq(cv(s0), c2))), diffsc(s0, c1))

thm lublecl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), cdm(c3)), wss(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), c0), wreu(hs1, c0, wa(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c0, wi(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2)))))))
  a1i(w0, wss(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), c0))
  ssrab2(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2))
  syl2anc(w0, wreu(hs1, c0, wa(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c0, wi(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2)))))), wcel(c2, c0), wral(hs1, c0, wb(wa(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c0, wi(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))))), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))

  lublecllem(hs1, hs0, s0, hs2, c0, c1, c2, c4, c3, w0)
  reu6i(hs1, c2, c0, wa(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c0, wi(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))))))

  biid(wa(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c0, wi(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))))))

thm lublecl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí { s0 ‚àà c0 | s0[c1]c2 } ‚àà dom(c3))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(le ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(lub ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà Poset)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, { s0 ‚àà c0 | s0[c1]c2 } ‚àà dom(c3), { s0 ‚àà c0 | s0[c1]c2 } ‚äÜ c0, ‚àÉ!(hs1 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs1)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs2)‚Üí hs1[c1]hs2)))))
  a1i(w0, { s0 ‚àà c0 | s0[c1]c2 } ‚äÜ c0)
  ssrab2(s0, c0, s0[c1]c2)
  syl2anc(w0, ‚àÉ!(hs1 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs1)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs2)‚Üí hs1[c1]hs2)))), c2 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,((‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs1)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs2)‚Üí hs1[c1]hs2)))‚Üî hs1 = c2)))
  ralrimiva(hs1, c0, w0, ((‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs1)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs2)‚Üí hs1[c1]hs2)))‚Üî hs1 = c2))
  lublecllem(hs1, hs0, s0, hs2, c0, c1, c2, c4, c3, w0)
  reu6i(hs1, c2, c0, (‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs1)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs2)‚Üí hs1[c1]hs2))))
  lubeldm(hs1, hs0, hs2, { s0 ‚àà c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, c3, c0, c4, c1, cpo, w0, (‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs1)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs2)‚Üí hs1[c1]hs2))))
  biid((‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs1)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs2)‚Üí hs1[c1]hs2))))

blocks.name: lubid
blocks.content: The LUB of elements less than or equal to a fixed value equals that value. (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-2011.) (Revised by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)

thm lubid(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, crab(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3))), c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))

thm lubid(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` { s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c2]c3 })= c3)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(le ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(lub ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà Poset)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0 ` { s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c2]c3 }), c3, iota(hs1 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c2]c3 }, hs0[c2]hs1)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c2]c3 }, hs0[c2]hs2)‚Üí hs1[c2]hs2)))), w0)
  lubval(hs1, hs0, hs2, c0, { s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c2]c3 }, c1, c4, c2, cpo, w0, (‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c2]c3 }, hs0[c2]hs1)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c2]c3 }, hs0[c2]hs2)‚Üí hs1[c2]hs2))))
  biid((‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c2]c3 }, hs0[c2]hs1)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c2]c3 }, hs0[c2]hs2)‚Üí hs1[c2]hs2))))
  a1i(w0, { s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c2]c3 } ‚äÜ c1)
  ssrab2(s0, c1, s0[c2]c3)
  riota5(hs1, c1, c3, w0, (‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c2]c3 }, hs0[c2]hs1)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c2]c3 }, hs0[c2]hs2)‚Üí hs1[c2]hs2))))
  lublecllem(hs1, hs0, s0, hs2, c1, c2, c3, c4, c0, w0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c({ s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c2]c3 })
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c2]c3 })
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c({ s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c2]c3 })
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)

  diff.hs2.c(c3)

  abbii(s0, wreu(s1, c1, w1), wreu(s1, c1, wa(wral(s2, cv(s0), wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2))), wral(s3, c1, wi(wral(s2, cv(s0), wbr(cv(s3), c3, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s3), c3, cv(s1)))))))

  diff.hs0.c(c2)

  diff.hs0.c(cres(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crio(s1, c1, wa(wral(s2, cv(s0), wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2))), wral(s3, c1, wi(wral(s2, cv(s0), wbr(cv(s3), c3, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s3), c3, cv(s1))))))), cab(s0, wreu(s1, c1, wa(wral(s2, cv(s0), wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2))), wral(s3, c1, wi(wral(s2, cv(s0), wbr(cv(s3), c3, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s3), c3, cv(s1)))))))))

blocks.name: glbdm
blocks.content: Domain of the greatest lower bound function of a poset. (Contributed by NM, 6-Sep-2018.)

thm glbdm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), crab(s0, cpw(c1), wreu(s1, c1, w1))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cple, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cglb, c2))
  -| wb(w1, wa(wral(s2, cv(s0), wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2))), wral(s3, c1, wi(wral(s2, cv(s0), wbr(cv(s3), c3, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s3), c3, cv(s1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
} = {
  syl6eq(cdm(c0), crab(s0, cpw(c1), wreu(s1, c1, w1)), cdm(cres(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crio(s1, c1, w1)), cab(s0, wreu(s1, c1, w1)))), w0)
  dmeqd(c0, cres(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crio(s1, c1, w1)), cab(s0, wreu(s1, c1, w1))), w0)
  glbfval(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0, w1)
  3eqtr4i(cdm(cres(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crio(s1, c1, w1)), cab(s0, wreu(s1, c1, w1)))), crab(s0, cpw(c1), wreu(s1, c1, w1)), cin(cab(s0, wreu(s1, c1, w1)), cdm(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crio(s1, c1, w1)))), cin(cab(s0, wreu(s1, c1, w1)), cpw(c1)))
  ineq2i(cab(s0, wreu(s1, c1, w1)), cdm(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crio(s1, c1, w1))), cpw(c1))
  dmmpti(s0, cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crio(s1, c1, w1)), cpw(c1), crio(s1, c1, w1))
  riotaex(s1, c1, w1)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crio(s1, c1, w1)))
  dmres(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crio(s1, c1, w1)), cab(s0, wreu(s1, c1, w1)))
  dfrab2(s0, cpw(c1), wreu(s1, c1, w1))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
}

thm glbdm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí dom(c0)= { s0 ‚àà P(c1)| ‚àÉ!(s1 ‚àà c1, w1)})
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(le ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(glb ` c2)
  ‚ä£ (w1 ‚Üî(‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0, s1[c3]s2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0, s3[c3]s2)‚Üí s3[c3]s1))))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)

blocks.name: glbelss
blocks.content: A member of the domain of the greatest lower bound function is a subset of the base set. (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm glbelss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cple, c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cglb, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c4)))
} = {
  simpld(w0, wss(c0, c1), wreu(hs0, c1, wa(wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c1, wi(wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs2), c3, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs2), c3, cv(hs0)))))))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wss(c0, c1), wreu(hs0, c1, wa(wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c1, wi(wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs2), c3, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs2), c3, cv(hs0))))))), wcel(c0, cdm(c4)))
  glbeldm(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c4, c1, c2, c3, c5, w0, wa(wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c1, wi(wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs2), c3, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs2), c3, cv(hs0))))))
  biid(wa(wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c1, wi(wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs2), c3, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs2), c3, cv(hs0))))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ c1)

  biid((‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs0[c3]hs1)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs2[c3]hs1)‚Üí hs2[c3]hs0))))

blocks.name: glbeu
blocks.content: Unique existence proper of a member of the domain of the greatest lower bound function of a poset. (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm glbeu(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wreu(s0, c0, w1))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cple, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cglb, c1))
  -| wb(w1, wa(wral(s1, c4, wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))), wral(s2, c0, wi(wral(s1, c4, wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cdm(c3)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
} = {
  simprd(w0, wreu(s0, c0, w1), wss(c4, c0))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wss(c4, c0), wreu(s0, c0, w1)), wcel(c4, cdm(c3)))
  glbeldm(s0, s1, s2, c4, c3, c0, c1, c2, c5, w0, w1)
}

thm glbprop(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` c0)[c2]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s1[c2](c1 ` c0)))))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(le ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(glb ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà dom(c1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` c0)[c2]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s1[c2](c1 ` c0))))), d(s0, c2))
  mpbird(w0, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` c0)[c2]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s1[c2](c1 ` c0)))), iota(hs0 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0[c2]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s1[c2]hs0))))=(c1 ` c0))
  eqcomd(iota(hs0 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0[c2]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s1[c2]hs0)))), (c1 ` c0), w0)
  glbval(hs0, s0, s1, c1, c0, c3, c4, c2, c5, w0, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0[c2]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s1[c2]hs0))))
  glbelss(c0, c3, c4, c2, c1, c5, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` c0)[c2]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s1[c2](c1 ` c0))))‚Üî iota(hs0 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0[c2]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s1[c2]hs0))))=(c1 ` c0)), (c1 ` c0)‚àà c3, ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0[c2]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s1[c2]hs0)))))
  glbcl(c1, c0, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  glbeu(hs0, s0, s1, c3, c4, c2, c1, c0, c5, w0, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0[c2]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s1[c2]hs0))))
  biid((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0[c2]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s1[c2]hs0))))
  riota2(hs0, (c1 ` c0), c3, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0[c2]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s1[c2]hs0))), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` c0)[c2]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s1[c2](c1 ` c0)))))
  anbi12d(hs0 =(c1 ` c0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0[c2]s0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s1[c2]hs0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` c0)[c2]s0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s1[c2](c1 ` c0))))
  ralbidv(s0, c0, hs0 =(c1 ` c0), hs0[c2]s0, (c1 ` c0)[c2]s0)
  breq1(hs0, (c1 ` c0), c2, s0)
  ralbidv(s1, c3, hs0 =(c1 ` c0), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s1[c2]hs0), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s1[c2](c1 ` c0)))
  imbi2d(hs0 =(c1 ` c0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s1[c2]s0), s1[c2]hs0, s1[c2](c1 ` c0))
  breq2(hs0, (c1 ` c0), s1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` c0)[c2]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s1[c2]s0)‚Üí s1[c2](c1 ` c0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, (c1 ` c0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, (c1 ` c0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)

thm glble(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cple, c5))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cglb, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c1))
} = {
  rspcdva(hs0, c3, c1, w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c3), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), c2, cv(hs0)))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c3, cfv(c0, c1), c2)
  simpld(w0, wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), c2, cv(hs0))), wral(hs1, c4, wi(wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cfv(c0, c1)))))
  glbprop(hs0, hs1, c1, c0, c2, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c3))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
}

thm glble(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)[c2]c3)

thm joinfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(club, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cjn, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)))), wcel(c0, universe))

  ssexd(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2))), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), universe, wcel(c0, universe))
  a1i(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), universe))
  oprabex(s0, s1, s2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  a1i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wmo(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  moeq(s2, cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  eqid(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  syl(wcel(c0, universe), wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2))), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))))
  alrimiv(s0, wcel(c0, universe), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))))
  alrimiv(s1, wcel(c0, universe), wal(s2, wi(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))
  alrimiv(s2, wcel(c0, universe), wi(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))

  ax-mp(wb(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(s2)))), wfun(c3))
  lubfun(c3, c0)
  funbrfv2b(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))
  anim12d1(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(s2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  syl6ibr(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  ex(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  lubelss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cbs, c0), c0, cfv(cple, c0), c3, universe, wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3))))

  dmoprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  opabbii(s0, s1, wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)))
  mpbiran2(wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wex(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  isseti(hs0, cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c7))
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c1), cdm(c2)), wcel(cpr(c0, c1), cdm(c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)))))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cdm(c2)), wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3))))), wcel(c4, c5))
  eleq2d(cop(c0, c1), cdm(c2), copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3))), wcel(c4, c5))
  joindm(hs0, hs1, c4, c5, c2, c3)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)))), wcel(cpr(c0, c1), cdm(c3))), wcel(c0, c6), wcel(c1, c7))
  opelopabg(hs0, hs1, c0, c6, c1, c7, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wcel(cpr(c0, c1), cdm(c3)), wcel(cpr(c0, cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)))
  eleq1d(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3), cpr(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  preq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  eleq1d(cpr(c0, cv(hs1)), cdm(c3), cpr(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  preq2(cv(hs1), c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cpr(c0, c1), cdm(c3)))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cpr(c0, c1), cdm(c3)))
}

thm joindef(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(< c0, c1 > ‚àà dom(c2)‚Üî { c0, c1 } ‚àà dom(c3)))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(lub ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(join ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c7)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, < c0, c1 > ‚àà dom(c2), { c0, c1 } ‚àà dom(c3), < c0, c1 > ‚àà { < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom(c3)})
  syl(w0, (< c0, c1 > ‚àà dom(c2)‚Üî < c0, c1 > ‚àà { < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom(c3)}), c4 ‚àà c5)
  eleq2d(< c0, c1 >, dom(c2), { < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom(c3)}, c4 ‚àà c5)
  joindm(hs0, hs1, c4, c5, c2, c3)
  syl2anc(w0, (< c0, c1 > ‚àà { < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom(c3)} ‚Üî { c0, c1 } ‚àà dom(c3)), c0 ‚àà c6, c1 ‚àà c7)
  opelopabg(hs0, hs1, c0, c6, c1, c7, { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom(c3), { c0, c1 } ‚àà dom(c3), { c0, hs1 } ‚àà dom(c3))
  eleq1d({ hs0, hs1 }, dom(c3), { c0, hs1 }, hs0 = c0)
  preq1(hs0, c0, hs1)
  eleq1d({ c0, hs1 }, dom(c3), { c0, c1 }, hs1 = c1)
  preq2(hs1, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w({ c0, c1 } ‚àà dom(c3))
  diff.hs1.w({ c0, c1 } ‚àà dom(c3))
}

thm joinval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c7))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2))), wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)))
  eqtrd(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), co(c0, coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), c2), wa(w0, wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3))))

  oveqd(c0, c1, c2, coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(c1, coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))), wcel(c4, c5))
  joinfval2(hs0, hs1, hs2, c4, c5, c1, c3)
  mp2and(wa(w0, wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3))), wceq(co(c0, coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), c2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2))), wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2))))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)))
  eqidd(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), wa(w0, wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wi(wa(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))), wceq(co(c0, coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), c2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))))
  syl3anc(w0, wi(wa(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))), wceq(co(c0, coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), c2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))), wcel(c0, c6), wcel(c2, c7), wcel(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), universe))
  fvexd(c3, cpr(c0, c2), w0)
  ovigg(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c6, c2, c7, cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), universe, coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), wa(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  anbi12d(w3a(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2))))
  3adant3(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2))), wb(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3))))
  eleq1d(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3), cpr(c0, c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  eqeq12d(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), w3a(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))))
  simp3(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2))))
  3adant3(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2))), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2))))
  fveq2d(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(c0, c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  preq12(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1), c2)
  moani(hs2, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  moeq(hs2, cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  eqid(coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))
  eqtr4d(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), emptycls, wa(w0, wn(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)))))
  imp(w0, wn(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3))), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), emptycls))
  syl6bir(w0, wn(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3))), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), emptycls), wn(wcel(cop(c0, c2), cdm(c1))))
  notbid(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c2), cdm(c1)), wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)))
  joindef(c0, c2, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  syl5eq(co(c0, c1, c2), emptycls, cfv(c1, cop(c0, c2)), wn(wcel(cop(c0, c2), cdm(c1))))
  df-ov(c0, c1, c2)
  ndmfv(cop(c0, c2), c1)
  adantl(w0, wn(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3))), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), emptycls))
  ndmfv(cpr(c0, c2), c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))))
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
}

thm joinval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[c1]c2)=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(lub ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(join ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c7)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, (c0[c1]c2)=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }), { c0, c2 } ‚àà dom(c3))
  eqtrd((c0[c1]c2), (c3 ` { c0, c2 }), (c0[{ < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom(c3)‚àß hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}]c2), (w0 ‚àß { c0, c2 } ‚àà dom(c3)))
  adantr(w0, { c0, c2 } ‚àà dom(c3), (c0[c1]c2)=(c0[{ < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom(c3)‚àß hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}]c2))
  oveqd(c0, c1, c2, { < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom(c3)‚àß hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}, w0)
  syl(w0, c1 = { < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom(c3)‚àß hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}, c4 ‚àà c5)
  joinfval2(hs0, hs1, hs2, c4, c5, c1, c3)
  mp2and((w0 ‚àß { c0, c2 } ‚àà dom(c3)), (c0[{ < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom(c3)‚àß hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}]c2)=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }), { c0, c2 } ‚àà dom(c3), (c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }))
  simpr(w0, { c0, c2 } ‚àà dom(c3))
  eqidd((c3 ` { c0, c2 }), (w0 ‚àß { c0, c2 } ‚àà dom(c3)))
  adantr(w0, { c0, c2 } ‚àà dom(c3), (({ c0, c2 } ‚àà dom(c3)‚àß(c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }))‚Üí(c0[{ < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom(c3)‚àß hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}]c2)=(c3 ` { c0, c2 })))
  syl3anc(w0, (({ c0, c2 } ‚àà dom(c3)‚àß(c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }))‚Üí(c0[{ < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom(c3)‚àß hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}]c2)=(c3 ` { c0, c2 })), c0 ‚àà c6, c2 ‚àà c7, (c3 ` { c0, c2 })‚àà ùïå)
  fvexd(c3, { c0, c2 }, w0)
  ovigg(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c6, c2, c7, (c3 ` { c0, c2 }), universe, { < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom(c3)‚àß hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}, ({ c0, c2 } ‚àà dom(c3)‚àß(c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 })), ({ hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom(c3)‚àß hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 })))
  anbi12d((hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2 ‚àß hs2 =(c3 ` { c0, c2 })), { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom(c3), hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }), { c0, c2 } ‚àà dom(c3), (c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }))
  3adant3(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, hs2 =(c3 ` { c0, c2 }), ({ hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom(c3)‚Üî { c0, c2 } ‚àà dom(c3)))
  eleq1d({ hs0, hs1 }, dom(c3), { c0, c2 }, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  eqeq12d(hs2, (c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }), (c3 ` { c0, c2 }), (c3 ` { c0, c2 }), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2 ‚àß hs2 =(c3 ` { c0, c2 })))
  simp3(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, hs2 =(c3 ` { c0, c2 }))
  3adant3(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, hs2 =(c3 ` { c0, c2 }), (c3 ` { hs0, hs1 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }))

  moani(hs2, { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom(c3), hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))
  moeq(hs2, (c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))

  eqtr4d((c0[c1]c2), (c3 ` { c0, c2 }), emptycls, (w0 ‚àß ¬¨ { c0, c2 } ‚àà dom(c3)))
  imp(w0, ¬¨ { c0, c2 } ‚àà dom(c3), (c0[c1]c2)= ‚àÖ)
  syl6bir(w0, ¬¨ { c0, c2 } ‚àà dom(c3), (c0[c1]c2)= ‚àÖ, ¬¨ < c0, c2 > ‚àà dom(c1))
  notbid(w0, < c0, c2 > ‚àà dom(c1), { c0, c2 } ‚àà dom(c3))
  joindef(c0, c2, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  syl5eq((c0[c1]c2), emptycls, (c1 ` < c0, c2 >), ¬¨ < c0, c2 > ‚àà dom(c1))
  df-ov(c0, c1, c2)
  ndmfv(< c0, c2 >, c1)
  adantl(w0, ¬¨ { c0, c2 } ‚àà dom(c3), (c3 ` { c0, c2 })= ‚àÖ)
  ndmfv({ c0, c2 }, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)

  diff.hs1.c(c0)

  diff.hs2.c(c0)

  diff.hs1.w(({ c0, c2 } ‚àà dom(c3)‚àß(c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 })))
  diff.hs2.w(({ c0, c2 } ‚àà dom(c3)‚àß(c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 })))
  diff.hs2.c((c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))
}

blocks.name: joincl
blocks.content: Closure of join of elements in the domain. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm joincl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cjn, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c2), cdm(c1)))
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, cfv(cfv(club, c4), cpr(c0, c2)), w0)
  joinval(c0, c1, c2, cfv(club, c4), c4, c5, c3, c3, w0)
  lubcl(cfv(club, c4), cpr(c0, c2), c3, c4, c5, w0)
  mpbid(w0, wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(cfv(club, c4))), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cdm(c1)))
  joindef(c0, c2, c1, cfv(club, c4), c4, c5, c3, c3, w0)
  eqid(cfv(club, c4))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm joincl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[c1]c2)‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(join ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí < c0, c2 > ‚àà dom(c1))
} = {
  eqeltrd((c0[c1]c2), c3, ((lub ` c4)` { c0, c2 }), w0)
  joinval(c0, c1, c2, (lub ` c4), c4, c5, c3, c3, w0)
  lubcl((lub ` c4), { c0, c2 }, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  mpbid(w0, { c0, c2 } ‚àà dom((lub ` c4)), < c0, c2 > ‚àà dom(c1))
  joindef(c0, c2, c1, (lub ` c4), c4, c5, c3, c3, w0)
  eqid((lub ` c4))
}

thm joindmss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(cdm(c0), cxp(c1, c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cjn, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
} = {
  relssdv(hs0, hs1, cdm(c0), cxp(c1, c1), w0)
  mpbiri(w0, wrel(cdm(c0)), wrel(copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(club, c2))))))
  relopab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(club, c2))))
  releqd(cdm(c0), copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(club, c2)))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(club, c2))))), wcel(c2, c3))
  joindm(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, c0, cfv(club, c2))
  sylbid(w0, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c1)), wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(club, c2))))
  joindef(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, cfv(club, c2), c2, c3, universe, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  a1i(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), universe))
  syl6(w0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(club, c2))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c1)), wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))
  ex(w0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(club, c2))), wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))
  lubelss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1, c2, cfv(cple, c2), cfv(club, c2), c3, wa(w0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(club, c2)))))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c2))
  eqid(cfv(club, c2))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(club, c2))), wcel(c2, c3))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(club, c2))))
  sylbir(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))
  prss(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  opelxpi(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c1, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cdm(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cxp(c1, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}

thm joindmss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí dom(c0)‚äÜ(c1 √ó c1))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(join ` c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
} = {
  relssdv(hs0, hs1, dom(c0), (c1 √ó c1), w0)
  mpbiri(w0, Rel(dom(c0)), Rel({ < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom((lub ` c2))}))
  relopab(hs0, hs1, { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom((lub ` c2)))
  releqd(dom(c0), { < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom((lub ` c2))}, w0)
  syl(w0, dom(c0)= { < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom((lub ` c2))}, c2 ‚àà c3)
  joindm(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, c0, (lub ` c2))
  sylbid(w0, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà dom(c0), < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà(c1 √ó c1), { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom((lub ` c2)))
  joindef(hs0, hs1, c0, (lub ` c2), c2, c3, universe, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, hs0 ‚àà ùïå)
  a1i(w0, hs1 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl6(w0, { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom((lub ` c2)), < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà(c1 √ó c1), { hs0, hs1 } ‚äÜ c1)
  ex(w0, { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom((lub ` c2)), { hs0, hs1 } ‚äÜ c1)
  lubelss({ hs0, hs1 }, c1, c2, (le ` c2), (lub ` c2), c3, (w0 ‚àß { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom((lub ` c2))))
  eqid((le ` c2))
  eqid((lub ` c2))
  adantr(w0, { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom((lub ` c2)), c2 ‚àà c3)
  simpr(w0, { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom((lub ` c2)))
  sylbir({ hs0, hs1 } ‚äÜ c1, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà(c1 √ó c1), (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c1))
  prss(hs0, c1, hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  opelxpi(hs0, c1, hs1, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(dom(c0))
  diff.hs0.c((c1 √ó c1))
  diff.hs1.c(dom(c0))
  diff.hs1.c((c1 √ó c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}

thm joinval2lem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s0[c3]s1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s0[c3]s2)‚Üí s1[c3]s2)))‚Üî((c0[c3]s1 ‚àß c2[c3]s1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((c0[c3]s2 ‚àß c2[c3]s2)‚Üí s1[c3]s2)))))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(le ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(join ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)

blocks.name: joinval2
blocks.content: Value of join for a poset with LUB expanded. (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-2011.) (Revised by NM, 11-Sep-2018.)

thm joinval2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), crio(s0, c3, wa(wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s1)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cple, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cjn, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(c0, c1, c2), crio(s0, c3, wa(wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s1)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))), cfv(cfv(club, c5), cpr(c0, c2)), crio(s0, c3, wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))), w0)
  joinval(c0, c1, c2, cfv(club, c5), c5, c6, c3, c3, w0)
  lubval(s0, hs0, s1, cfv(club, c5), cpr(c0, c2), c3, c5, c4, c6, w0, wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))))
  eqid(cfv(club, c5))
  biid(wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))))
  prssd(c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(crio(s0, c3, wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))), crio(s0, c3, wa(wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s1)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))))), wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c3))
  riotabidv(s0, c3, wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))), wa(wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s1)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))))
  joinval2lem(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, c1, c6, w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cpr(c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.cpr.s(s1, c0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}
