thm joinval2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[c1]c2)= iota(s0 ‚àà c3,((c0[c4]s0 ‚àß c2[c4]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,((c0[c4]s1 ‚àß c2[c4]s1)‚Üí s0[c4]s1)))))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(le ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(join ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  3eqtrd((c0[c1]c2), iota(s0 ‚àà c3,((c0[c4]s0 ‚àß c2[c4]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,((c0[c4]s1 ‚àß c2[c4]s1)‚Üí s0[c4]s1)))), ((lub ` c5)` { c0, c2 }), iota(s0 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, hs0[c4]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, hs0[c4]s1)‚Üí s0[c4]s1)))), w0)
  joinval(c0, c1, c2, (lub ` c5), c5, c6, c3, c3, w0)
  lubval(s0, hs0, s1, (lub ` c5), { c0, c2 }, c3, c5, c4, c6, w0, (‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, hs0[c4]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, hs0[c4]s1)‚Üí s0[c4]s1))))
  eqid((lub ` c5))
  biid((‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, hs0[c4]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, hs0[c4]s1)‚Üí s0[c4]s1))))
  prssd(c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, iota(s0 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, hs0[c4]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, hs0[c4]s1)‚Üí s0[c4]s1))))= iota(s0 ‚àà c3,((c0[c4]s0 ‚àß c2[c4]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,((c0[c4]s1 ‚àß c2[c4]s1)‚Üí s0[c4]s1)))), c0 ‚àà c3, c2 ‚àà c3)
  riotabidv(s0, c3, (c0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), (‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, hs0[c4]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, hs0[c4]s1)‚Üí s0[c4]s1))), ((c0[c4]s0 ‚àß c2[c4]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,((c0[c4]s1 ‚àß c2[c4]s1)‚Üí s0[c4]s1))))
  joinval2lem(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, c1, c6, w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c({ c0, c2 })
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.cpr.s(s1, c0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà c3, c2 ‚àà c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

blocks.name: joineu
blocks.content: Uniqueness of join of elements in the domain. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm joineu(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wreu(s0, c0, wa(wa(wbr(c1, c2, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c2, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wa(wbr(c1, c2, cv(s1)), wbr(c3, c2, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cple, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cjn, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cop(c1, c3), cdm(c5)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wreu(s0, c0, wa(wa(wbr(c1, c2, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c2, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wa(wbr(c1, c2, cv(s1)), wbr(c3, c2, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))))), wcel(cop(c1, c3), cdm(c5)))

  eqid((lub ` c4))

  adantr(w0, { c1, c3 } ‚àà dom((lub ` c4)), c4 ‚àà c6)

  reubidv(s0, c0, w0, (‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c1, c3 }, hs0[c2]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c1, c3 }, hs0[c2]s1)‚Üí s0[c2]s1))), ((c1[c2]s0 ‚àß c3[c2]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,((c1[c2]s1 ‚àß c3[c2]s1)‚Üí s0[c2]s1))))

thm joinle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c2)), wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2)))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))

} = {
  impbid(w0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c2)), wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2))
  rspcdva(hs0, c2, c5, w0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c2)), wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c3, c1, cv(hs0))), wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, cv(hs0))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c3, c1, cv(hs0))), wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, cv(hs0)), wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c2)), wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c3, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c2))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c2, c0, c1)
  breq2(cv(hs0), c2, c3, c1)
  breq2(cv(hs0), c2, co(c0, c4, c3), c1)
  simprd(w0, wral(hs0, c5, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c3, c1, cv(hs0))), wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, cv(hs0)))), wa(wbr(c0, c1, co(c0, c4, c3)), wbr(c3, c1, co(c0, c4, c3))))
  joinlem(hs0, c0, c1, c4, c3, c5, c6, cpo, w0)
  jcad(w0, wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2), wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c2))
  mpand(w0, wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2), wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c1, co(c0, c4, c3)))
  lejoin1(c0, c1, c4, c3, c5, c6, cpo, w0)
  syl13anc(w0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, co(c0, c4, c3)), wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2)), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c6, cpo), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(co(c0, c4, c3), c5), wcel(c2, c5))
  postr(c6, c0, c5, co(c0, c4, c3), c2, c1)
  mpand(w0, wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, co(c0, c4, c3)))
  lejoin2(c3, c1, c0, c4, c5, c6, cpo, w0)
  syl13anc(w0, wi(wa(wbr(c3, c1, co(c0, c4, c3)), wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2)), wbr(c3, c1, c2)), wcel(c6, cpo), wcel(c3, c5), wcel(co(c0, c4, c3), c5), wcel(c2, c5))
  joincl(c0, c4, c3, c5, c6, cpo, w0)
  postr(c6, c3, c5, co(c0, c4, c3), c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c3[c1]c2)‚Üî(c0[c4]c3)[c1]c2))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c6)

} = {

  simprd(w0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c5,((c0[c1]hs0 ‚àß c3[c1]hs0)‚Üí(c0[c4]c3)[c1]hs0)), (c0[c1](c0[c4]c3)‚àß c3[c1](c0[c4]c3)))
  joinlem(hs0, c0, c1, c4, c3, c5, c6, cpo, w0)

  syl13anc(w0, ((c0[c1](c0[c4]c3)‚àß(c0[c4]c3)[c1]c2)‚Üí c0[c1]c2), c6 ‚àà Poset, c0 ‚àà c5, (c0[c4]c3)‚àà c5, c2 ‚àà c5)
  postr(c6, c0, c5, (c0[c4]c3), c2, c1)
  mpand(w0, (c0[c4]c3)[c1]c2, c3[c1]c2, c3[c1](c0[c4]c3))
  lejoin2(c3, c1, c0, c4, c5, c6, cpo, w0)
  syl13anc(w0, ((c3[c1](c0[c4]c3)‚àß(c0[c4]c3)[c1]c2)‚Üí c3[c1]c2), c6 ‚àà Poset, c3 ‚àà c5, (c0[c4]c3)‚àà c5, c2 ‚àà c5)
  joincl(c0, c4, c3, c5, c6, cpo, w0)

thm meetfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cglb, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmee, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  syl5eq(c2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2))), cfv(cmee, c0), wcel(c0, universe))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(cfv(cmee, c0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)))), wcel(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2))), universe))
  ssexd(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2))), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), universe, wcel(c0, universe))
  a1i(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), universe))
  oprabex(s0, s1, s2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  a1i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wmo(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  moeq(s2, cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  eqid(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  syl(wcel(c0, universe), wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2))), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))))
  alrimiv(s0, wcel(c0, universe), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))))
  alrimiv(s1, wcel(c0, universe), wal(s2, wi(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))
  alrimiv(s2, wcel(c0, universe), wi(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  syl5bi(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(s2))))
  ax-mp(wb(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(s2)))), wfun(c3))

  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cglb, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmee, c0))

  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  syl6eq(c2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2))), wcel(c0, c1))
  meetfval(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  oprabbii(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  bitri(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(s2))))
  ax-mp(wb(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(s2)))), wfun(c3))
  glbfun(c3, c0)

thm meetdm(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(c2), copab(s0, s1, wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cglb, c0))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  syl6eq(cdm(c2), copab(s0, s1, wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3))), cdm(coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), wcel(c0, c1))

  eqtri(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), copab(s0, s1, wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3))), copab(s0, s1, wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))
  dmoprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  opabbii(s0, s1, wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)))
  mpbiran2(wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wex(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  isseti(hs0, cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  fvex(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  19.42v(hs0, wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  syl(w0, c1 = { < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom(c3)‚àß hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}, c4 ‚àà c5)

  simpr(w0, { c0, c2 } ‚àà dom(c3))

}

blocks.content: Closure of meet of elements in the domain. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm meetcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmee, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c2), cdm(c1)))
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, cfv(cfv(cglb, c4), cpr(c0, c2)), w0)
  meetval(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cglb, c4), c4, c5, c3, c3, w0)
  glbcl(cfv(cglb, c4), cpr(c0, c2), c3, c4, c5, w0)
  mpbid(w0, wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(cfv(cglb, c4))), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cdm(c1)))
  meetdef(c0, c2, c1, cfv(cglb, c4), c4, c5, c3, c3, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cglb, c4))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm meetcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[c1]c2)‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(meet ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí < c0, c2 > ‚àà dom(c1))
} = {
  eqeltrd((c0[c1]c2), c3, ((glb ` c4)` { c0, c2 }), w0)
  meetval(c0, c1, c2, (glb ` c4), c4, c5, c3, c3, w0)
  glbcl((glb ` c4), { c0, c2 }, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  mpbid(w0, { c0, c2 } ‚àà dom((glb ` c4)), < c0, c2 > ‚àà dom(c1))
  meetdef(c0, c2, c1, (glb ` c4), c4, c5, c3, c3, w0)
  eqid((glb ` c4))
}

blocks.name: meetdmss
blocks.content: Subset property of domain of meet. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm meetdmss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(cdm(c0), cxp(c1, c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cmee, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
} = {
  relssdv(hs0, hs1, cdm(c0), cxp(c1, c1), w0)
  mpbiri(w0, wrel(cdm(c0)), wrel(copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(cglb, c2))))))
  relopab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(cglb, c2))))
  releqd(cdm(c0), copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(cglb, c2)))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(cglb, c2))))), wcel(c2, c3))
  meetdm(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, c0, cfv(cglb, c2))
  sylbid(w0, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c1)), wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(cglb, c2))))
  meetdef(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, cfv(cglb, c2), c2, c3, universe, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  a1i(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), universe))
  syl6(w0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(cglb, c2))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c1)), wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))
  ex(w0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(cglb, c2))), wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))
  glbelss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1, c2, cfv(cple, c2), cfv(cglb, c2), c3, wa(w0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(cglb, c2)))))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cglb, c2))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(cglb, c2))), wcel(c2, c3))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(cglb, c2))))
  sylbir(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))
  prss(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  opelxpi(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c1, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cdm(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cxp(c1, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm meetdmss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí dom(c0)‚äÜ(c1 √ó c1))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(meet ` c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
} = {
  relssdv(hs0, hs1, dom(c0), (c1 √ó c1), w0)
  mpbiri(w0, Rel(dom(c0)), Rel({ < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom((glb ` c2))}))
  relopab(hs0, hs1, { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom((glb ` c2)))
  releqd(dom(c0), { < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom((glb ` c2))}, w0)
  syl(w0, dom(c0)= { < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom((glb ` c2))}, c2 ‚àà c3)
  meetdm(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, c0, (glb ` c2))
  sylbid(w0, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà dom(c0), < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà(c1 √ó c1), { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom((glb ` c2)))
  meetdef(hs0, hs1, c0, (glb ` c2), c2, c3, universe, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, hs0 ‚àà ùïå)
  a1i(w0, hs1 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl6(w0, { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom((glb ` c2)), < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà(c1 √ó c1), { hs0, hs1 } ‚äÜ c1)
  ex(w0, { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom((glb ` c2)), { hs0, hs1 } ‚äÜ c1)
  glbelss({ hs0, hs1 }, c1, c2, (le ` c2), (glb ` c2), c3, (w0 ‚àß { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom((glb ` c2))))
  eqid((le ` c2))
  eqid((glb ` c2))
  adantr(w0, { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom((glb ` c2)), c2 ‚àà c3)
  simpr(w0, { hs0, hs1 } ‚àà dom((glb ` c2)))
  sylbir({ hs0, hs1 } ‚äÜ c1, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà(c1 √ó c1), (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c1))
  prss(hs0, c1, hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  opelxpi(hs0, c1, hs1, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(dom(c0))
  diff.hs0.c((c1 √ó c1))
  diff.hs1.c(dom(c0))
  diff.hs1.c((c1 √ó c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}

  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))

  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmee, c4))

  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wa(wral(s0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0))), wral(s2, c1, wi(wral(s0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s2), c3, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s2), c3, cv(s1))))), wa(wa(wbr(cv(s1), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s1), c3, c2)), wral(s2, c1, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s2), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s2), c3, c2)), wbr(cv(s2), c3, cv(s1))))))), wceq(c5, cfv(cmee, c4)))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wa(wral(s0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0))), wral(s2, c1, wi(wral(s0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s2), c3, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s2), c3, cv(s1))))), wa(wa(wbr(cv(s1), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s1), c3, c2)), wral(s2, c1, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s2), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s2), c3, c2)), wbr(cv(s2), c3, cv(s1))))))), wi(w0, wcel(c4, c6)))

  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wa(wral(s0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0))), wral(s2, c1, wi(wral(s0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s2), c3, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s2), c3, cv(s1))))), wa(wa(wbr(cv(s1), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s1), c3, c2)), wral(s2, c1, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s2), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s2), c3, c2)), wbr(cv(s2), c3, cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s0, c4))

  breq2(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2), c3)

thm meetval2lem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c3]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s2[c3]s0)‚Üí s2[c3]s1)))‚Üî((s1[c3]c0 ‚àß s1[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s2[c3]c0 ‚àß s2[c3]c2)‚Üí s2[c3]s1)))))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(le ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(meet ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c3]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s2[c3]s0)‚Üí s2[c3]s1)))‚Üî((s1[c3]c0 ‚àß s1[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s2[c3]c0 ‚àß s2[c3]c2)‚Üí s2[c3]s1))))), c1 =(Base ` c4))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c3]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s2[c3]s0)‚Üí s2[c3]s1)))‚Üî((s1[c3]c0 ‚àß s1[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s2[c3]c0 ‚àß s2[c3]c2)‚Üí s2[c3]s1))))), c3 =(le ` c4))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c3]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s2[c3]s0)‚Üí s2[c3]s1)))‚Üî((s1[c3]c0 ‚àß s1[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s2[c3]c0 ‚àß s2[c3]c2)‚Üí s2[c3]s1))))), c5 =(meet ` c4))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c3]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s2[c3]s0)‚Üí s2[c3]s1)))‚Üî((s1[c3]c0 ‚àß s1[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s2[c3]c0 ‚àß s2[c3]c2)‚Üí s2[c3]s1))))), (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c6))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c3]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s2[c3]s0)‚Üí s2[c3]s1)))‚Üî((s1[c3]c0 ‚àß s1[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s2[c3]c0 ‚àß s2[c3]c2)‚Üí s2[c3]s1))))), (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c1))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c3]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s2[c3]s0)‚Üí s2[c3]s1)))‚Üî((s1[c3]c0 ‚àß s1[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s2[c3]c0 ‚àß s2[c3]c2)‚Üí s2[c3]s1))))), (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c1))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c3]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s2[c3]s0)‚Üí s2[c3]s1)))‚Üî((s1[c3]c0 ‚àß s1[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s2[c3]c0 ‚àß s2[c3]c2)‚Üí s2[c3]s1))))), d(s1, s2))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c3]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s2[c3]s0)‚Üí s2[c3]s1)))‚Üî((s1[c3]c0 ‚àß s1[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s2[c3]c0 ‚àß s2[c3]c2)‚Üí s2[c3]s1))))), d(s0, c4))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c3]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s2[c3]s0)‚Üí s2[c3]s1)))‚Üî((s1[c3]c0 ‚àß s1[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s2[c3]c0 ‚àß s2[c3]c2)‚Üí s2[c3]s1))))), d(s1, c0))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c3]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s2[c3]s0)‚Üí s2[c3]s1)))‚Üî((s1[c3]c0 ‚àß s1[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s2[c3]c0 ‚àß s2[c3]c2)‚Üí s2[c3]s1))))), d(s1, c1))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c3]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s2[c3]s0)‚Üí s2[c3]s1)))‚Üî((s1[c3]c0 ‚àß s1[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s2[c3]c0 ‚àß s2[c3]c2)‚Üí s2[c3]s1))))), d(s1, c2))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c3]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s2[c3]s0)‚Üí s2[c3]s1)))‚Üî((s1[c3]c0 ‚àß s1[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s2[c3]c0 ‚àß s2[c3]c2)‚Üí s2[c3]s1))))), d(s1, c4))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c3]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s2[c3]s0)‚Üí s2[c3]s1)))‚Üî((s1[c3]c0 ‚àß s1[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s2[c3]c0 ‚àß s2[c3]c2)‚Üí s2[c3]s1))))), d(s1, c5))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c3]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s2[c3]s0)‚Üí s2[c3]s1)))‚Üî((s1[c3]c0 ‚àß s1[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s2[c3]c0 ‚àß s2[c3]c2)‚Üí s2[c3]s1))))), d(s2, c4))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c3]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s2[c3]s0)‚Üí s2[c3]s1)))‚Üî((s1[c3]c0 ‚àß s1[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s2[c3]c0 ‚àß s2[c3]c2)‚Üí s2[c3]s1))))), d(s2, c5))
  anbi12d((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c3]s0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s2[c3]s0)‚Üí s2[c3]s1)), (s1[c3]c0 ‚àß s1[c3]c2), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s2[c3]c0 ‚àß s2[c3]c2)‚Üí s2[c3]s1)))
  ralprg(s0, c0, c1, c2, c1, s1[c3]s0, s1[c3]c0, s1[c3]c2)
  breq2(s0, c0, s1, c3)
  breq2(s0, c2, s1, c3)
  ralbidv(s2, c1, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s2[c3]s0)‚Üí s2[c3]s1), ((s2[c3]c0 ‚àß s2[c3]c2)‚Üí s2[c3]s1))
  imbi1d((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s2[c3]s0), s2[c3]s1, (s2[c3]c0 ‚àß s2[c3]c2))
  ralprg(s0, c0, c1, c2, c1, s2[c3]s0, s2[c3]c0, s2[c3]c2)

  breq2(s0, c2, s2, c3)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, s1, c3, c0)

thm meetval2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), crio(s0, c3, wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c2)), wral(s1, c3, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), c4, c0), wbr(cv(s1), c4, c2)), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0))))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cple, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmee, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(c0, c1, c2), crio(s0, c3, wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c2)), wral(s1, c3, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), c4, c0), wbr(cv(s1), c4, c2)), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)))))), cfv(cfv(cglb, c5), cpr(c0, c2)), crio(s0, c3, wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)))))), w0)
  meetval(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cglb, c5), c5, c6, c3, c3, w0)
  glbval(s0, hs0, s1, cfv(cglb, c5), cpr(c0, c2), c3, c5, c4, c6, w0, wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0))))))
  eqid(cfv(cglb, c5))
  biid(wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0))))))
  prssd(c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(crio(s0, c3, wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)))))), crio(s0, c3, wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c2)), wral(s1, c3, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), c4, c0), wbr(cv(s1), c4, c2)), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0))))))), wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c3))
  riotabidv(s0, c3, wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0))))), wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c2)), wral(s1, c3, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), c4, c0), wbr(cv(s1), c4, c2)), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0))))))
  meetval2lem(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, c1, c6, w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cpr(c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.cpr.s(s1, c0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

thm meetval2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[c1]c2)= iota(s0 ‚àà c3,((s0[c4]c0 ‚àß s0[c4]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,((s1[c4]c0 ‚àß s1[c4]c2)‚Üí s1[c4]s0)))))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(le ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(meet ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  3eqtrd((c0[c1]c2), iota(s0 ‚àà c3,((s0[c4]c0 ‚àß s0[c4]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,((s1[c4]c0 ‚àß s1[c4]c2)‚Üí s1[c4]s0)))), ((glb ` c5)` { c0, c2 }), iota(s0 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s0[c4]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c4]hs0)‚Üí s1[c4]s0)))), w0)
  meetval(c0, c1, c2, (glb ` c5), c5, c6, c3, c3, w0)
  glbval(s0, hs0, s1, (glb ` c5), { c0, c2 }, c3, c5, c4, c6, w0, (‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s0[c4]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c4]hs0)‚Üí s1[c4]s0))))
  eqid((glb ` c5))
  biid((‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s0[c4]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c4]hs0)‚Üí s1[c4]s0))))
  prssd(c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, iota(s0 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s0[c4]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c4]hs0)‚Üí s1[c4]s0))))= iota(s0 ‚àà c3,((s0[c4]c0 ‚àß s0[c4]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,((s1[c4]c0 ‚àß s1[c4]c2)‚Üí s1[c4]s0)))), c0 ‚àà c3, c2 ‚àà c3)
  riotabidv(s0, c3, (c0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), (‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s0[c4]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, s1[c4]hs0)‚Üí s1[c4]s0))), ((s0[c4]c0 ‚àß s0[c4]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,((s1[c4]c0 ‚àß s1[c4]c2)‚Üí s1[c4]s0))))
  meetval2lem(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, c1, c6, w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c({ c0, c2 })
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.cpr.s(s1, c0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà c3, c2 ‚àà c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

thm meeteu(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wreu(s0, c0, wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c3)), wral(s1, c0, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), c1, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cple, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmee, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cop(c2, c3), cdm(c5)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wreu(s0, c0, wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c3)), wral(s1, c0, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), c1, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))), wcel(cop(c2, c3), cdm(c5)))
  sylbid(w0, wcel(cop(c2, c3), cdm(c5)), wreu(s0, c0, wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c3)), wral(s1, c0, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), c1, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))), wcel(cpr(c2, c3), cdm(cfv(cglb, c4))))
  meetdef(c2, c3, c5, cfv(cglb, c4), c4, c6, c0, c0, w0)
  sylibd(w0, wcel(cpr(c2, c3), cdm(cfv(cglb, c4))), wreu(s0, c0, wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c3)), wral(s1, c0, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), c1, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))), wreu(s0, c0, wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c2, c3), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c2, c3), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))))
  ex(w0, wcel(cpr(c2, c3), cdm(cfv(cglb, c4))), wreu(s0, c0, wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c2, c3), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c2, c3), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))))
  glbeu(s0, hs0, s1, c0, c4, c1, cfv(cglb, c4), cpr(c2, c3), c6, wa(w0, wcel(cpr(c2, c3), cdm(cfv(cglb, c4)))), wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c2, c3), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c2, c3), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))))))
  eqid(cfv(cglb, c4))
  biid(wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c2, c3), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c2, c3), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cpr(c2, c3), cdm(cfv(cglb, c4))), wcel(c4, c6))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cpr(c2, c3), cdm(cfv(cglb, c4))))
  reubidv(s0, c0, w0, wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c2, c3), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c2, c3), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))))), wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c3)), wral(s1, c0, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), c1, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))))))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c2, c3), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c2, c3), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))))), wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c3)), wral(s1, c0, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), c1, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0))
  meetval2lem(hs0, s0, s1, c2, c0, c3, c1, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(cpr(c2, c3))
  diff.cpr.s(s1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm meeteu(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c0,((s0[c1]c2 ‚àß s0[c1]c3)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,((s1[c1]c2 ‚àß s1[c1]c3)‚Üí s1[c1]s0)))))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(le ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(meet ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí < c2, c3 > ‚àà dom(c5))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c0,((s0[c1]c2 ‚àß s0[c1]c3)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,((s1[c1]c2 ‚àß s1[c1]c3)‚Üí s1[c1]s0)))), < c2, c3 > ‚àà dom(c5))
  sylbid(w0, < c2, c3 > ‚àà dom(c5), ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c0,((s0[c1]c2 ‚àß s0[c1]c3)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,((s1[c1]c2 ‚àß s1[c1]c3)‚Üí s1[c1]s0)))), { c2, c3 } ‚àà dom((glb ` c4)))
  meetdef(c2, c3, c5, (glb ` c4), c4, c6, c0, c0, w0)
  sylibd(w0, { c2, c3 } ‚àà dom((glb ` c4)), ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c0,((s0[c1]c2 ‚àß s0[c1]c3)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,((s1[c1]c2 ‚àß s1[c1]c3)‚Üí s1[c1]s0)))), ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c2, c3 }, s0[c1]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c2, c3 }, s1[c1]hs0)‚Üí s1[c1]s0)))))
  ex(w0, { c2, c3 } ‚àà dom((glb ` c4)), ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c2, c3 }, s0[c1]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c2, c3 }, s1[c1]hs0)‚Üí s1[c1]s0)))))
  glbeu(s0, hs0, s1, c0, c4, c1, (glb ` c4), { c2, c3 }, c6, (w0 ‚àß { c2, c3 } ‚àà dom((glb ` c4))), (‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c2, c3 }, s0[c1]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c2, c3 }, s1[c1]hs0)‚Üí s1[c1]s0))))
  eqid((glb ` c4))
  biid((‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c2, c3 }, s0[c1]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c2, c3 }, s1[c1]hs0)‚Üí s1[c1]s0))))
  adantr(w0, { c2, c3 } ‚àà dom((glb ` c4)), c4 ‚àà c6)
  simpr(w0, { c2, c3 } ‚àà dom((glb ` c4)))
  reubidv(s0, c0, w0, (‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c2, c3 }, s0[c1]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c2, c3 }, s1[c1]hs0)‚Üí s1[c1]s0))), ((s0[c1]c2 ‚àß s0[c1]c3)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,((s1[c1]c2 ‚àß s1[c1]c3)‚Üí s1[c1]s0))))
  syl2anc(w0, ((‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c2, c3 }, s0[c1]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c2, c3 }, s1[c1]hs0)‚Üí s1[c1]s0)))‚Üî((s0[c1]c2 ‚àß s0[c1]c3)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,((s1[c1]c2 ‚àß s1[c1]c3)‚Üí s1[c1]s0)))), c2 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà c0)
  meetval2lem(hs0, s0, s1, c2, c0, c3, c1, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c({ c2, c3 })
  diff.cpr.s(s1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

  |- wi(w0, wa(wa(wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c0), wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c2)), wral(s0, c4, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, co(c0, c1, c2))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))

  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmee, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))

} = {
  sylib(w0, wa(wa(wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c0), wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c2)), wral(s0, c4, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, co(c0, c1, c2))))), wsbc(hs0, co(c0, c1, c2), wa(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), c3, c2)), wral(s0, c4, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0)))))))

  syl(w0, wsbc(hs0, crio(hs0, c4, wa(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), c3, c2)), wral(s0, c4, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0)))))), wa(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), c3, c2)), wral(s0, c4, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0)))))), wreu(hs0, c4, wa(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), c3, c2)), wral(s0, c4, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0)))))))
  meeteu(hs0, s0, c4, c3, c0, c2, c5, c1, c6, w0)
  riotasbc(hs0, c4, wa(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), c3, c2)), wral(s0, c4, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0))))))
  sbceq1d(hs0, co(c0, c1, c2), crio(hs0, c4, wa(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), c3, c2)), wral(s0, c4, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0)))))), w0, wa(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), c3, c2)), wral(s0, c4, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0))))))
  meetval2(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, c4, c3, c5, c6, w0)
  sbcie(hs0, co(c0, c1, c2), wa(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), c3, c2)), wral(s0, c4, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0))))), wa(wa(wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c0), wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c2)), wral(s0, c4, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, co(c0, c1, c2))))))
  ovex(c0, c1, c2)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), c3, c2)), wral(s0, c4, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0)))), wa(wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c0), wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c2)), wral(s0, c4, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, co(c0, c1, c2)))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), c3, c2), wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c0), wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c2))
  breq1(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c0)
  breq1(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c2)
  ralbidv(s0, c4, wceq(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, co(c0, c1, c2))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, co(c0, c1, c2)))
  breq2(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(s0), c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c0), wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c2)), wral(s0, c4, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, co(c0, c1, c2))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c1, c2)
}

thm meetlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(((c0[c1]c2)[c3]c0 ‚àß(c0[c1]c2)[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,((s0[c3]c0 ‚àß s0[c3]c2)‚Üí s0[c3](c0[c1]c2)))))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(le ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(meet ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí < c0, c2 > ‚àà dom(c1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
} = {
  sylib(w0, (((c0[c1]c2)[c3]c0 ‚àß(c0[c1]c2)[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,((s0[c3]c0 ‚àß s0[c3]c2)‚Üí s0[c3](c0[c1]c2)))), [(c0[c1]c2)/ hs0]((hs0[c3]c0 ‚àß hs0[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,((s0[c3]c0 ‚àß s0[c3]c2)‚Üí s0[c3]hs0))))
  mpbird(w0, [(c0[c1]c2)/ hs0]((hs0[c3]c0 ‚àß hs0[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,((s0[c3]c0 ‚àß s0[c3]c2)‚Üí s0[c3]hs0))), [iota(hs0 ‚àà c4,((hs0[c3]c0 ‚àß hs0[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,((s0[c3]c0 ‚àß s0[c3]c2)‚Üí s0[c3]hs0))))/ hs0]((hs0[c3]c0 ‚àß hs0[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,((s0[c3]c0 ‚àß s0[c3]c2)‚Üí s0[c3]hs0))))

  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wceq(co(c2, c5, c4), co(c4, c5, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmee, c0))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wceq(co(c2, c5, c4), co(c4, c5, c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  3eqtr4rd(co(c2, c5, c4), co(c4, c5, c2), cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), cpr(c4, c2)), cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), cpr(c2, c4)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), cpr(c4, c2)), cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), cpr(c2, c4))))
  fveq2i(cfv(cglb, c0), cpr(c4, c2), cpr(c2, c4))
  prcom(c4, c2)
  meetval(c4, c5, c2, cfv(cglb, c0), c0, c1, c3, c3, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)))
  meetval(c2, c5, c4, cfv(cglb, c0), c0, c1, c3, c3, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)))
  eqid(cfv(cglb, c0))
  simp1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3))
  simp2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3))
  simp3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm meetcomALT(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c2[c5]c4)=(c4[c5]c2))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(meet ` c0)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c2[c5]c4)=(c4[c5]c2)), c3 =(Base ` c0))
  3eqtr4rd((c2[c5]c4), (c4[c5]c2), ((glb ` c0)` { c4, c2 }), ((glb ` c0)` { c2, c4 }), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c3))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c3), ((glb ` c0)` { c4, c2 })=((glb ` c0)` { c2, c4 }))
  fveq2i((glb ` c0), { c4, c2 }, { c2, c4 })
  prcom(c4, c2)
  meetval(c4, c5, c2, (glb ` c0), c0, c1, c3, c3, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c3))
  meetval(c2, c5, c4, (glb ` c0), c0, c1, c3, c3, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c3))
  eqid((glb ` c0))
  simp1(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c3)
  simp2(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c3)
  simp3(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c3)
}

blocks.name: meetcom
blocks.content: The meet of a poset commutes. (The antecedent ` <. X , Y >. e. dom ./\ /\ <. Y , X >. e. dom ./\ ` i.e. "the meets exist" could be omitted as an artifact of our particular join definition, but other definitions may require it.) (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2011.) axiom df-toset(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(ctos, crab(s0, cpo, wsbc(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wsbc(s2, cfv(cple, cv(s0)), wral(s3, cv(s1), wral(s4, cv(s1), wo(wbr(cv(s3), cv(s2), cv(s4)), wbr(cv(s4), cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-toset(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ Toset = { s0 ‚àà Poset |[(Base ` s0)/ s1][(le ` s0)/ s2]‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s1, ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà s1,(s3[s2]s4 ‚à® s4[s2]s3)))}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
}

thm p0val(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(c3, c4)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cglb, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cp0, c0))
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(c3, c4)), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  syl5eq(c2, cfv(c3, c4), cfv(cp0, c0), wcel(c0, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cp0, cfv(c3, c4), cfv(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))
  fveq12d(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cglb, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cglb)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c4, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  df-p0(hs0)
  fvex(c3, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c3, c4))
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(c3 ` c4))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(glb ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(0. ` c0)
} = {
  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 =(c3 ` c4), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  syl5eq(c2, (c3 ` c4), (0. ` c0), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cp0, (c3 ` c4), ((glb ` hs0)`(Base ` hs0)))
  fveq12d((glb ` hs0), (Base ` hs0), c3, c4, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((glb ` hs0), c3, (glb ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cglb)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c4, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  df-p0(hs0)
  fvex(c3, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((c3 ` c4))
}

blocks.name: p1val
blocks.content: Value of poset zero. (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm p1val(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(c3, c4)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(club, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cp1, c0))
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(c3, c4)), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  syl5eq(c2, cfv(c3, c4), cfv(cp1, c0), wcel(c0, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cp1, cfv(c3, c4), cfv(cfv(club, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))
  fveq12d(cfv(club, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(club, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(club, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, club)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c4, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  df-p1(hs0)
  fvex(c3, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c3, c4))
}

blocks.name: p0le
blocks.content: Any element is less than or equal to a poset's upper bound (if defined). (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2011.) (Revised by NM, 13-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm p0le(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cglb, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cple, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cp0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cdm(c5)))
} = {
  eqbrtrd(c0, c1, c2, cfv(c5, c3), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(c5, c3)), wcel(c4, c6))
  p0val(c4, c6, c0, c5, c3)
  glble(c5, c3, c1, c2, c3, c4, c6, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm p0le(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0[c1]c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(glb ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(le ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(0. ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà dom(c5))
} = {
  eqbrtrd(c0, c1, c2, (c5 ` c3), w0)
  syl(w0, c0 =(c5 ` c3), c4 ‚àà c6)
  p0val(c4, c6, c0, c5, c3)
  glble(c5, c3, c1, c2, c3, c4, c6, w0)
}

thm ple1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(club, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cple, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cp1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cdm(c5)))
} = {

  luble(c0, c1, c5, c3, c3, c4, c6, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(c5, c3)), wcel(c4, c6))
  p1val(c4, c6, c2, c5, c3)
}
